# PadelStats Web Application

This is a complete web application for PadelStats - a sensor device that attaches to padel rackets to measure various parameters.

## Project Structure
- `backend/` - Django REST API backend
- `frontend/` - React.js frontend application
- `docs/` - Documentation and assets

## Key Features
- Product showcase with detailed specifications
- Blog system with articles
- Help section with FAQ and contact form
- Responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern React hooks and functional components
- Follow Django REST framework best practices
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Use TypeScript for better type safety
- Follow component-based architecture

## API Endpoints
- `/api/products/` - Product information
- `/api/blog/` - Blog articles
- `/api/contact/` - Contact form submissions
- `/api/faq/` - Frequently asked questions

## Pricing Information
- Regular price: €84.99
- Discounted price: €59.99
- Bulk offer: 4 units for €49.99 each

## Product Features to Highlight
- Power measurement
- Spin analysis
- Precision tracking
- Physical exertion monitoring
- Battery life: 4h 30min
- Durable construction
- Mobile app connectivity (PadelStats app on Play Store/App Store)
